Package edu.sru.thangiah.webrouting.controller

Class LocationsController

java.lang.Object
edu.sru.thangiah.webrouting.controller.LocationsController
@Controller public class LocationsController extends Object
Handles the Thymeleaf controls for the pages dealing with Locations.
Since:
2/1/2022
Author:
Logan Kirkwood llk1005@sru.edu

  • Method Details

    • showLocationsList

      @RequestMapping("/locations") public String showLocationsList(org.springframework.ui.Model model, javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Adds all of the attributes to the model to render the locations page
      Parameters:
      model - used to load attributes into the Thymeleaf model
      session - used to load attributes into the current users HTTP session
      Returns:
      /locations

    • showAddLocationsExcel

      @RequestMapping("/uploadlocations") public String showAddLocationsExcel(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Redirects user to the /uploadlocations page when clicking "Upload an excel file" button in the locations section of Carrier login
      Parameters:
      model - used to add data to the model
      Returns:
      /uploadlocations

    • deleteLocation

      @GetMapping("/deletelocations/{id}") public String deleteLocation(@PathVariable("id") long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model, javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Finds a location using the id parameter and if found, redirects to the confirmation page Makes sure there are no dependencies before deleting. If there are, an error message is displayed
      Parameters:
      id - of the location to be deleted
      model - used to load attributes into the Thymeleaf model
      session - used to load attributes into the current users HTTP session
      Returns:
      /delete/deletelocationconfirm or redirectLocation

    • deleteLocationConfirmation

      @GetMapping("/deletelocationconfirmation/{id}") public String deleteLocationConfirmation(@PathVariable("id") long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Finds a location using the id parameter and if found, deletes the location and redirects to locations page
      Parameters:
      id - of the location being deleted
      model - used to load attributes into the Thymeleaf model
      Returns:
      redirects to /locations

    • viewLocation

      @GetMapping("/viewlocation/{id}") public String viewLocation(@PathVariable("id") long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model, javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Finds a location using the id parameter and if found, adds the details of that location to the locations page
      Parameters:
      id - of the location to be viewed
      model - used to load attributes into the Thymeleaf model
      session - used to load attributes into the current users HTTP session
      Returns:
      /locations

    • showLocationsEditForm

      @GetMapping("/editlocations/{id}") public String showLocationsEditForm(@PathVariable("id") long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model, javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Adds all of the required attributes to the model to render the edit locations page
      Parameters:
      id - of the location being edited
      model - used to load attributes into the Thymeleaf model
      session - used to load attributes into the current users HTTP session
      Returns:
      /edit/edit-locations

    • locationsUpdateForm

      @PostMapping("edit-locations/{id}") public String locationsUpdateForm(@PathVariable("id") long id, Locations locations, org.springframework.ui.Model model, javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Receives and passes the new location object off to be validated Once validated the object is saved to the location repository
      Parameters:
      id - of the location being edited
      locations - holds the new location object submitted by the user
      model - used to load attributes into the Thymeleaf model
      session - used to load attributes into the current users HTTP session
      Returns:
      redirect to /locations or /edit/edit-locations

    • showLocationAddForm

      @GetMapping("/add-location") public String showLocationAddForm(Locations location, org.springframework.ui.Model model, javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Adds all of the required attributes to the model to render the add location page
      Parameters:
      location - holds the new location being added to the model
      model - used to load attributes into the Thymeleaf model
      session - used to load attributes into the current users HTTP session
      Returns:
      /add/add-location

    • locationAddForm

      @PostMapping("submit-add-location") public String locationAddForm(@ModelAttribute("locationForm") Locations location, org.springframework.ui.Model model, javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Receives a location object by the user and passes it off for validation Once valid it is saved to the location repository
      Parameters:
      location - holds the new location created by the user
      model - used to load attributes into the Thymeleaf model
      session - used to load attributes into the current users HTTP session
      Returns:
      /add/add-location
